    level="1"

>
[Orc Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=4516) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw against a spell or magical effect, and have not yet rolled

</column>

---

You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your saving throw against the triggering spell or magical effect.

<title level="2">Orc Superstition leads to...</title>
[Pervasive Superstition](/Feats.aspx?ID=4524), [Spell Survivor](/Feats.aspx?ID=7649)
name: Orc Superstition
